alert.note: Alert for Limestone (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 11:38PM CDT until June 12 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN MCLENNAN...SOUTHEASTERN BOSQUE...NORTHWESTERN LIMESTONE AND HILL COUNTIES... At 1138 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of West, or 13 miles northwest of Lacy-Lakeview, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Waco, Bellmead, Hillsboro, Lacy-Lakeview, West, Mart, Whitney, Hubbard, Laguna Park, Valley Mills, Hallsburg, Bynum, Carl`s Corner, Tradinghouse Creek Reservoir, Aquilla Lake, Lake Whitney State Park, Lake Whitney, Northcrest, Lake Waco and China Spring. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
